name: Hunter Tactics Trial: An Ambushing Bow
description: In order to learn the basic tactics of Hunter, challenge the trial of the Training Chapel
steps: Speak with the White Knight at the base of the cliff before the Training Chapel
Speak with Wilson in the Training Chapel
Attack an enemy with Loose from the optimum distance
Attack an enemy with Explosive Arrow
Attack the enemy by detonating the explosive arrow
Attack an enemy with Front Kick
Defeat the remaining Goblins in the inner sanctum
Collect the proof of completing the trial
Report back to Renton in the White Dragon Temple
